Text:
After the weekend I always wait eagerly for the next Nascar race torrent. In Europe it's difficult to watch, so I (or should I say "we"?) appreciate these Nascar uploads very!

Thanks so much!

THX for Pocono, what happened to Dover? I noticed I could watch Michigan live on-line, but in Europe it gets pretty late. I dozed off at lap 120 and only woke up to the cheers of Dale's win. I would still like to see the rest of the race...

Thank you SOOOO much for the races. 
Please upload the full Michigan race......
